Question: This person was inaugurated in the Kremlin on 7 May 2012.
Hints: In 2012 this person reported an income of 3.6 million rubles ($113,000).
It resembles medieval calls for crusades.", During the whole event, this person condemned other steps taken by NATO.
Anatoly Sobchak was at the time an Assistant Professor and lectured this person's class on Business Law (khozyaystvennoye pravo).
